post_text: March 1, 2016 at 3:45 AM#1Hi,I'm experimenting about SetUserVar but can't get to a conclusion;what I want is;* Copy cue (X Copy Cue Number?) at Cue(Y Store Cue Number?)* Stomp Cue Y* Update Cue Yso basically, I just enter the numbers for Copy Cue Number and Store Cue Number.The Stomp Cue and Update Cue will follow whatever number I key in on ' Y Store Cue Number 'I tried;* SetUserVar $selectedex=( "Store Cue Number ?" )* Copy Cue ( Copy Cue Number?) at Cue $selectedex* Stomp Cue $selectedex* Update Cue $selectedexIt work fine,But it will popup the 'Store Cue Number ?' firstI want it to popup 'Copy Cue Number?' first then 'Store Cue Number ?'Please advice
